title: sequencer.commit@1.0.0
description: Payload representing a sequencer batch commitment to a canonical log.

batchCid.description: Content identifier (CID) of the ordered transaction batch.

transactionCount.description: Number of transactions included in the batch.

parentBatchRoot.description: Merkle root of the previous committed batch, if any.

sealedAt.description: Unix timestamp when the batch commitment was sealed.

metadata.description: Implementation specific metadata for the commitment.
